title: Neeyum Bommai Lyics Moodar Koodam Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Neeyum Bommai
Singer: K.J.Yesudas
Music:Natarajan Shankaran
Movie: Moodar Koodam

Neeyum bommai naanum bommai
nenachu paarthaa ellaam bommai
thayin madiyil pillayum bommai
thalaivan munnay thondanum bommai
kovilil vazhum dheivamum bommai
adhai kumbidum manidhar yaavarum bommai

Neeyum bommai naanum bommai
nenachu paarthaa ellaam bommai

Vallavan kaiyil nallavan bommai
ullavan mun illadhavan bommai (2)
allum pagalum uzhaipavan bommai
dhinam allal pattu azhaibavan bommai

anbin anaippil annaivarum bommai
aasai vaarthaiyil arivum bommai (2)
inbacholayil iyarkai bommai
andha iyarkai ammaipil edhuvumey bommai

Neeyum bommai naanum bommai
nenachu paarthaa ellaam bommai
vidhiyil paarvayil uyirgal bommai
veesum puyalil ulagamey bommai
nadhiyin munnay dharmamum bommai
varum saavin pidiyil vazhvum bommai
